definition: to break/to snap/to cut off/to give up or abstain from sth/to judge/(usu. used in the negative) absolutely/definitely/decidedly
to split/to crack/to break open/to rend

sentences.english: So it's a kind of machine which take advantage of fatigue-fracture.
sentences.chinese: 因而，它是一种化害为利，利用疲劳断裂下料的机械。

sentences.english: The fracture of the tie bolts of the D39 main engine has been analysed briefly.
sentences.chinese: 对D39主机底脚螺栓断裂事故进行了简略的分析。

sentences.english: An experimental study on the gouge along Xiaojiang fault has been carried out.
sentences.chinese: 对小江断裂带的断层泥进行了实验研究。

sentences.english: A axle of blast furnace charging wagon broke in use.
sentences.chinese: 高炉上料车车轴在使用过程中发生断裂。

sentences.english: Banpo antimony deposit is a typical fracture-controlling and hydrothermal fluid filling deposit.
sentences.chinese: 半坡锑矿床是典型的断裂控矿，热液充填型矿床。

sentences.english: A broken wood bridge, looked like was damaged by the thunderstorm.
sentences.chinese: 一个断裂的木桥，看上去象是被暴风雨冲垮的。

sentences.english: The infections endocarditis was a major cause of the secondary ruptures group. The repair …
sentences.chinese: 感染性心内膜炎是继发性瓣膜腱索断裂的主要原因。

sentences.english: The distribution of the gold deposits clings to deep big faults.
sentences.chinese: 金矿床分布与深大断裂存在依附性。

sentences.english: The northeastward Xiangshui fault zone in this area is the main rock-control and ore-control structure.
sentences.chinese: 区内北东向响水断裂带是主要的控岩和控矿构造。

sentences.english: The above research results reflect the shock isolation effect and hanging wall effect of fractures.
sentences.chinese: 本研究结果反映断裂的隔震效应与上盘效应。

sentences.english: Pinghu fault is the main passage for the vertical migration of oil and gas.
sentences.chinese: 平湖断裂是天然气垂向运移的主要通道。

sentences.english: Echocardiography demonstrated tricuspid chordae tendinae rupture with remarkable tricuspid regurgitation .
sentences.chinese: 心脏超音波证实三尖瓣腱索断裂及明显的三尖瓣逆流。

sentences.english: Stage I. Transverse fracture of medial malleolus or rupture of deltoid ligament.
sentences.chinese: 度内踝的横行骨折或三角韧带断裂。

sentences.english: Shancheng gold ore deposit is a fault controlled quartz-vein type gold ore deposit in Shandong province.
sentences.chinese: 山城金矿为石英脉型金矿，受断裂构造控制。

sentences.english: The ability of the bending and cracking resistance of the steel saw blade was evaluated by bending strength and deflection.
sentences.chinese: 用弯曲强度及挠度评定钢锯条抗弯曲断裂的能力。

sentences.english: Stage II. Rupture of anterior tibiofibular ligament and interosseous ligament.
sentences.chinese: II度胫腓前韧带和骨间膜断裂。

definition: to rupture/to fracture/to break down/(linguistics) plosion
to break/to sever/to turn off (electric switch)
to rupture/to burst open/to break up
to disintegrate/to shatter into small pieces
to drop off/to come off/to lose (hair etc)/to omit (a character when writing)
to split open/to dehisce (of fruit or cotton bolls, to split open)
deformation/to become deformed/to change shape/to morph
